name: Climbmon
effect: [When Digivolving] If this Digimon is suspended, return 1 of your opponent's suspended Digimon with DP less than or equal to this Digimon's DP to its owner's hand.
digivolve_effect: [Your Turn] When this Digimon becomes unsuspended during your unsuspend phase, suspend 1 of your opponent's Digimon.
